verses.text: \w The|strong="H1732"\w* king \w shall|strong="H1732"\w* joy \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w thy|strong="H1732"\w* strength, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; \w and|strong="H1732"\w* \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w thy|strong="H1732"\w* salvation how greatly \w shall|strong="H1732"\w* \w he|strong="H1732"\w* rejoice!

\w Thou|strong="H4100"\w* hast \w given|strong="H8055"\w* \w him|strong="H8055"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* heartâ€™s desire, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* hast not withholden \w the|strong="H3068"\w* request \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* lips. \qs Selah\qs*

\w For|strong="H5414"\w* \w thou|strong="H5414"\w* preventest \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w with|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* blessings \w of|strong="H3820"\w* goodness: \w thou|strong="H5414"\w* settest \w a|strong="H3068"\w* crown \w of|strong="H3820"\w* fine gold \w on|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* head.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* asked life \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w thee|strong="H2896"\w*, \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* gavest \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w him|strong="H7896"\w*; \w even|strong="H3588"\w* length \w of|strong="H7218"\w* days \w for|strong="H3588"\w* ever \w and|strong="H7218"\w* ever.

\w His|strong="H5414"\w* glory \w is|strong="H3117"\w* great \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w thy|strong="H5414"\w* salvation: honour \w and|strong="H3117"\w* majesty dost \w thou|strong="H5414"\w* \w lay|strong="H5414"\w* \w upon|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* thou makest \w him|strong="H5921"\w* most blessed \w for|strong="H5921"\w* ever: thou makest \w him|strong="H5921"\w* glad \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w joy|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w thy|strong="H5921"\w* \w presence|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H6440"\w* trusteth \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w through|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* lovingkindness \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Most|strong="H1293"\w* High \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H6440"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H6440"\w* moved.

Thine hand \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* find out \w all|strong="H3068"\w* thine enemies: \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w right|strong="H3068"\w* hand \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* find out \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* hate thee.

\w Thou|strong="H3027"\w* shalt \w make|strong="H3027"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w as|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* fiery furnace \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* time \w of|strong="H3027"\w* thine anger. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* swallow \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w up|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* wrath, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* fire \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* devour \w them|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w Their|strong="H3068"\w* fruit shalt \w thou|strong="H6440"\w* \w destroy|strong="H1104"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* earth, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* seed \w from|strong="H6440"\w* among \w the|strong="H6440"\w* children \w of|strong="H3068"\w* men.

\w For|strong="H1121"\w* they intended evil against thee: they imagined \w a|strong="H3068"\w* device, which they \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H1121"\w* able \w to|strong="H1121"\w* perform.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* shalt \w make|strong="H2803"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w turn|strong="H5186"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w back|strong="H5186"\w*, \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* shalt \w make|strong="H2803"\w* ready \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w thy|strong="H5186"\w* bowstrings \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* face \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Be|strong="H6440"\w* \w thou|strong="H6440"\w* exalted, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w thy|strong="H6440"\w* strength: \w so|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H6440"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* sing \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \w thy|strong="H6440"\w* \w power|strong="H3559"\w*.
